examples.korean: state service 발음듣기 국무. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals. 발음듣기 국무 장관에게 그 제안들을 승인할 권한이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals. 발음

examples.korean: The prime minister encountered a group of protesters during his walkabout in the suburb. 발음듣기 국무총리는 교외에서 도보여행을 하는 동안 시위자들과 맞닥뜨렸다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The prime minister encountered a group of protesters during his walkabout in the suburb. 발음

examples.korean: U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un failed to reach an agreement on denuclearization at their summit here in the Vietnamese capital, Thursday. 발음듣기 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령과 김정은 북한 국무위원장이 목요일 베트남 하노이에서 열린 정상회담에서 비핵화에 관한 합의 도출에 실패했다. The Korea Times
examples.english: U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un failed to reach an agreement on denuclearization at their summit here in the Vietnamese capital, Thursday. 발음

examples.korean: President Moon said the process of achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula will involve difficulties. He added that the discussions in Hanoi were meaningful in that U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un spoke about the issue of setting up a U.S. liaison office in Pyongyang, "an important step toward the normalization of bilateral ties." 발음듣기 문 대통령은 한반도 평화를 이루기 위한 과정에는 어려움이 따를 것이라고 말했다. 그는 이어 하노이의 회담은 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령과 김정은 북한 국무위원장이 평양에 미국 연락사무소 설치 문제에 대해 "양국 관계 정상화를 향한 중요한 진전"이라고 말한 데 의미가 있다고 덧붙였다. The Korea Times
examples.english: President Moon said the process of achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula will involve difficulties. He added that the discussions in Hanoi were meaningful in that U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un spoke about the issue of setting up a U.S. liaison office in Pyongyang, "an important step toward the normalization of bilateral ties." 발음
